ingredients.ingredient: 1 (17.25 ounce) package frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed

cookingTips: Keep puff pastry thawed but cold; work quickly to prevent pastry from becoming warm and difficult to handle
The Dijon mustard layer prevents pastry from becoming soggy and adds a tangy element to balance rich sausage
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through wrapping sausage in pastry with proper sealing technique and how an egg wash creates a beautiful golden finish.
